svg.text: üöÄ ISRO Smart India Hackathon 2025 | Department of Space | Problem Statement ID: 25179
"Revolutionary Quantum-Secure Email Client with Novel 2025 Hybrid Encryption Framework"
üéØ Novel 2025 Breakthrough: QKD + ECDH + Real-PQC ‚Üí HKDF-SHA256 ‚Üí 256-bit Hybrid Key
